Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The activities are in a specific order given, and we need to consider all possible pairs where one activity eventually follows another in the process. For example, SS can be followed by OP, RC, QI, etc.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The time between two activities that are not consecutive would be the total time from the first to the second. For example, SS to CA would be the time from starting SS to completing CA, which would include all the steps in between.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Estimating average time and standard deviation for each pair based on supply chain steps. For SS to OP, once a supplier is selected, order is placed, so average 1 day (86400 seconds), stdev 0.5 day (43200). For OP to RC, supplier lead time around 5 days (432000), stdev 2 days (172800).

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Checking consistency: averages increase as pairs are further apart, stdev higher for more steps. For example, SS to RC is 6 days, matching SS to OP plus OP to RC.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Approximating standard deviations by combining individual steps variability, like higher stdev for non-consecutive pairs influenced by main variable steps.
